alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rockingham, east central Hillsborough and south central Merrimack Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hooksett, or near Manchester, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Hooksett, Goffstown, Raymond, Londonderry, Bow, Chester, Candia and Dunbarton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 near mile marker 1, and between mile markers 7 and 11. Interstate 93 between mile markers 17 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Western And Central Hillsborough
